workflow_info.name: Flux Turbo Batch Processor - Optimized
workflow_info.description: Ultra-fast batch image generation with Flux Turbo LoRA (0.7 strength) optimized for rapid sequential processing

_meta.title: Load CLIP L + T5XXL Text Encoders

inputs.text: photorealistic image of a cyberpunk city landscape, neon lights, futuristic architecture, professional photography, high quality, sharp focus

_meta.title: Positive Prompt (Dynamic Template Support)
example_variations: photorealistic image of a futuristic spaceship
artistic image of a serene forest landscape
stylized image of an urban street

inputs.text: low quality, blurry, distorted, deformed, artifacts, watermark, text, logo, bad composition, oversaturated, desaturated

_meta.title: Initialize Latent Batch (512x512, Size=4)
_meta.optimization_notes: Smaller resolution (512) reduces VRAM usage and processing time while maintaining quality for Turbo

_meta.title: Batch Sampler - 8 Steps, CFG 1.5, Euler
_meta.seed_management: Increment seed for each batch iteration to ensure variation while maintaining reproducibility
_meta.optimization: Turbo model with FP8 quantization processes batch of 4 images in ~10-12 seconds (2.5-3s per image)

_meta.title: Seed Value (Primitive)
_meta.description: Base seed for reproducibility. Increment this value for continuous batch generation

_meta.title: Iteration Counter (Primitive)
_meta.description: Track batch generation iterations. Use for logging and seed offset calculation

_meta.title: Dynamic Prompt Template (Primitive)
_meta.description: Template for generating prompt variations. Expand with additional subjects and styles
_meta.template_guide: Format: {option1|option2|option3}. Each {} block is randomly selected. Combine multiple blocks for variations.

batch_processing_benefits.batch_size_4: Processes 4 images in single pass (~10-12 seconds on RTX 3090)
batch_processing_benefits.total_time_per_batch: 10-12 seconds for 4 images (2.5-3 seconds per image average)
batch_processing_benefits.memory_efficiency: Shared model loading overhead amortized across 4 images
batch_processing_benefits.throughput: 20 images per minute at full batch efficiency

resolution_optimization.512x512: Optimal for Turbo model. Reduces memory by 75% vs 1024x1024 while maintaining quality
resolution_optimization.quality_preservation: Turbo model designed for smaller resolutions with minimal quality loss

sampler_settings.steps: 8 steps optimal for Turbo (high-quality results with minimal compute)
sampler_settings.cfg: 1.5 (low guidance) - Turbo performs best with minimal guidance

lora_optimization.lora_strength: 0.7 recommended for Turbo (balances style injection and image quality)

continuous_batch_generation.seed_management: Increment seed by 1 for each batch to ensure variation
continuous_batch_generation.loop_strategy: Run workflow multiple times with incremented seed to generate 100+ images
continuous_batch_generation.reproducibility: Same seed produces identical image, enabling quality control and AB testing
continuous_batch_generation.example_script: PowerShell loop can submit workflow 25 times with seeds 0-24 to generate 100 images

example_outputs: photorealistic image of a futuristic spaceship interior
artistic image of a serene forest landscape at sunset
stylized image of an urban street with neon signs
photorealistic image of a mountain peak in winter
artistic image of an abstract color field painting

performance_tips.tip_1: Use seed=0 for first batch, then increment: 1, 2, 3, etc. for next batches
performance_tips.tip_2: Keep batch_size=4 for RTX 3090. Reduce to 2 if VRAM errors occur
performance_tips.tip_3: Monitor GPU usage with nvidia-smi to ensure optimal memory utilization
performance_tips.tip_4: Pre-cache models on first run to improve subsequent batch speed
performance_tips.tip_5: Use 'simple' scheduler instead of 'karras' for 2-3% speed improvement with Turbo

usage_instructions.single_batch: Submit this workflow once to generate 4 images with seed 0
usage_instructions.multiple_batches: Submit workflow 25 times with seeds 0-24 to generate 100 images
usage_instructions.dynamic_prompts: Edit node 5 (Positive Prompt) to use templates from node 13 for variation
usage_instructions.custom_resolution: Edit node 7 (EmptyLatentImage) to change width/height (keep ratio for best results)
usage_instructions.custom_lora_strength: Edit node 4 (LoraLoader) strength_model and strength_clip parameters (0.5-1.0 recommended)

example_script: # Generate 100 images in batches of 4 (25 iterations)
